subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Monaco missed a chance to move even on points with Paris St.-Germain, the Ligue 1 leaders, when it was held to a 1-1 draw by Montpellier.
snippet: Monaco missed a chance to move even on points with Paris St.-Germain, the Ligue 1 leaders, when it was held to a 1-1 draw by Montpellier.
